alert.note: Alert for Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 9:47PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Minnesota, including the following county, Renville. * WHEN...Until 645 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 8 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. - Water has been reported across portions of county highways 2 and 5 near Franklin. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fairfax and Franklin.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
